weekly_top5.name: DigitalBridge Group, Inc.

target.bear_case_note: Takeout narrative fades (no definitive agreement/terms), or deal-arb spread widens on regulatory/financing uncertainty; breakdown back below rising short-term MAs would weaken momentum.

primary_catalyst.title: SoftBank acquisition / takeover newsflow
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: M&A headlines can reprice the stock quickly via deal-premium expectations and follow-on coverage (terms, regulatory path, competing bids).

sources.title: SoftBank to acquire DigitalBridge for $4bn in AI infrastructure push
DigitalBridge lowered to Hold at Truist as SoftBank deal caps upside

risk_factors: Deal risk: terms/financing/regulatory timeline uncertainty can cause sharp reversals.
If a definitive agreement is already largely priced, upside may be capped and volatility can compress into deal-arb behavior.

weekly_top5.name: Rocket Lab Corporation

target.bear_case_note: Post-contract/analyst-upgrade momentum fades; failure to hold short-term moving averages with high realized vol could trigger a fast pullback.

primary_catalyst.title: Contract win + analyst price target raise (follow-through newsflow)
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Recent contract award and subsequent analyst re-rating can extend momentum via incremental buyers, model updates, and additional defense/space program headlines.

sources.title: Rocket Lab Takes Off On Contract Win, Triggers This Rare Bullish Signal
Needham Highlights Rocket Lab’s (RKLB) Shift to Major Defense Prime After Record $805M Satellite Award
Rocket Lab price target raised to $90 from $63 at Needham

risk_factors: Very high realized volatility (5d annualized ~98%) increases whipsaw risk around headlines.
Defense/space names can gap on contract timing/size details; catalyst may be partially priced after prior run.

weekly_top5.name: EchoStar Corporation

target.bear_case_note: If the spectrum/SpaceX-related narrative cools or analyst enthusiasm reverses, the stock can mean-revert quickly given prior extreme moves.

primary_catalyst.title: Analyst price target raise tied to spectrum deal / SpaceX valuation narrative
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Incremental analyst updates and ongoing deal-related headlines can drive another leg higher in a high-beta satellite/spectrum story.

sources.title: Citi Raises PT on EchoStar (SATS) stock
Citi: SpaceX’s $800B Valuation Doubles EchoStar’s (SATS) Expected Equity Value Following Spectrum Deal
EchoStar price target raised to $111 from $87 at Citi

risk_factors: Narrative-driven moves (SpaceX IPO talk/spectrum value) can reverse abruptly on lack of new information.
Potential 'already priced' risk given headlines citing very large prior-year surge.

weekly_top5.name: Huntington Ingalls Industries, Inc.

target.bear_case_note: If contract headlines fail to translate into material financial impact or broader defense tape weakens, the stock may consolidate rather than break out.

primary_catalyst.title: U.S. Navy-related contract / delivery newsflow
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Defense contract awards and program milestones can trigger rapid repricing, especially when the stock is already technically strong near highs.

sources.title: HII Secures Contract to Support USS Harry S. Truman Aircraft Carrier
Huntington Ingalls Ships Arleigh Burke-Class Destroyer to US Navy

risk_factors: Contract headlines may be incremental/expected; upside could be more muted versus higher-beta names.
Defense sector correlation: broad risk-off or budget headline risk can impact the group.

weekly_top5.name: Howmet Aerospace Inc.

target.bear_case_note: If acquisition-related optimism fades or integration/valuation concerns dominate, the stock may stall near highs; loss of trend support would invalidate momentum.

primary_catalyst.title: Acquisition-related re-rating / analyst commentary
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: M&A integration/strategic rationale and analyst revisions can drive near-term multiple expansion, especially with defense/aerospace demand tailwinds.

sources.title: Jefferies Backs Howmet (HWM) Acquisition, Sees EPS Lift into 2026
Here's Why Howmet's CAM Acquisition is Strategically Important

risk_factors: M&A/integration risk and potential 'priced-in' EPS lift after multiple articles.
Aerospace/defense cycle sensitivity; any macro risk-off could compress multiples.
